post.author: 신민용
post.content:
One of my agents asked me to recommend a good developer. his e-mail: Brad McIntosh brad@gurulink.ca Salary is around $80,000. Location is in missisauga. He said this job would need a lot of unix skill. I guess telcom-protocol may be nice to have.
If you are interested in it, let me know. I could put a good word for you.
- 4 + years of hardcore Java S/W experience (EJB, J2EE) - CORBA, Java RMI, Sockets shell commands - UML - Strong Unix Solaris experience (ability to write shell scripts) - Oracle 8i/9i, DB2, Informix - WAP, XML, SOAP - Strong C++ background on SUN - Excellent written/communication skills - Telecom related protocol: SS7, SMPP, GSM MAP, INAP, IS41, BSSMAP
post.title: senior java developer&designer
